newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia to raise pensions by 20 pct - Itar-Tass.
newsitem.headline: Russia to raise pensions by 20 pct - Itar-Tass.

text.p: The Russian government plans to raise pensions by 10 percent from October 1, and a further 10 percent from December 1, 1997, Itar-Tass news agency quoted Deputy Prime Minister Oleg Sysuyev as saying on Friday.
Sysuyev said the government planned to pass the draft document to the State Duma lower house of parliament after it was back from holidays in September.
The government paid 22 trillion roubles ($3.8 billion) in pension arrears last month and is now trying to repay at least 7.7 trillion roubles in wage arrears to public employees.
